article.title: November 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The November 2013 Galaxy Update is out:

Highlights:

  • Two new Galaxy public servers: CoSSci: Complex Social Science Gateway (which has nothing to do with biology), and BioCiphers Lab Galaxy.
  • 53 new papers, including "Expanding roles in a library-based bioinformatics service program: a case study," "DDBJ Read Annotation Pipeline: A Cloud Computing-Based Pipeline for High-Throughput Analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing Data," and "Ten Simple Rules for Reproducible Computational Research"
  • Who's hiring

  • Upcoming Events, including

    • Save these dates! GCC2014: June 30 - July 2, Baltimore
    • Galaxy Day, December 4, Paris
    • UC Davis Bioinformatics Boot Camps
  • Lifeportal launched at the University of Oslo
  • Tool Shed contributions

If you have anything you would like to see in the next Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
